projects.title: My Monthly
projects.description:
In collaboration with Shanshan, we crafted a product trailer animation for the couple calendar app My Monthly, showcasing its key features and brand ethos. Our collaboration involved conceptualizing the initial script, storyboarding, creating illustrations, and bringing the animation to life.

Subsequently, I independently crafted a 15-second motion reel to promote the upcoming release of the app. This reel was then showcased at Times Square.
